TDAT: 	private boolean checklock(){
		try{
			final File f = new File("musicdaze.lock");
			if (f.exists()){
				f.delete();
			}
			final FileChannel ch = new RandomAccessFile(f, "rw").getChannel();
			final FileLock lock = ch.tryLock();
			if (lock==null){
				ch.close();
				return false;
			}
			Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(new Runnable() {
				@Override
				public void run() {
					try {
						lock.release();
						ch.close();
						f.delete();
					} catch (IOException e) {
						// TODO Auto-generated catch block
						e.printStackTrace();
					}
				}
			}));
			return true;
		}
		catch (IOException io){
			io.printStackTrace();
			return false;
		}
	}

COM:checks for a lock file, creates it if it doesn't exist, and returns true if it is able to obtain a lock on the file
